trans-unit.source: NOTE: This answer changes SHA1s, so take care on using it on a branch that has already been pushed. If you only want to fix the spelling of a name or update an old email, git lets you do this without rewriting history using .mailmap. See my other answer.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此答案会更改SHA1，因此请小心在已推送的分支上使用它。如果您只想修正名称的拼写或更新旧的电子邮件，则git允许您执行此操作而无需使用 .mailmap 重写历史记录。看到我的其他答案。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: NOTES

trans-unit.source: This is a more elaborated version of @Brian's version:
trans-unit.target: 这是@Brian版本的详细版本：

trans-unit.source: Note that you might encounter some rough corners when using refs/replace/ mechanism: it is new, and not yet very well tested.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在使用 refs/replace/ 机制时，您可能会遇到一些困难：它是新的，尚未经过很好的测试。

trans-unit.source: A single command to change the author for the last N commits:
trans-unit.target: 一个用于更改最后N次提交的作者的命令：

trans-unit.source: A common "mistake" is to use HEAD instead, which means filtering all revisions on just the current branch. And then no tags (or other refs) would exist in the rewritten branch.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见的“错误”是改用 HEAD ，这意味着仅过滤当前分支上的所有修订。然后在重写的分支中将不存在任何标签（或其他引用）。

trans-unit.source: A little explanation of the -- --all option might be needed: It makes the filter-branch work on all revisions on all refs (which includes all branches). This means, for example, that tags are also rewritten and is visible on the rewritten branches.
trans-unit.target: 可能需要对 -- --all 选项进行一些解释：它使filter-branch在所有ref（包括所有分支）的所有修订版上起作用。例如，这意味着标记也被重写并且在重写的分支上可见。

trans-unit.source: Add to ~/.gitconfig:
trans-unit.target: 添加到~.gitconfig:

trans-unit.source: After putting that script on your path, you can issue commands like:
trans-unit.target: 在把这个脚本放到你的路径上之后,你可以发出类似这样的命令。

trans-unit.source: Alternate solution would be to use refs/replace/ mechanism, available in Git since version 1.6.5. In this solution you provide replacements for commits that have wrong email; then anybody who fetches 'replace' refs (something like fetch = +refs/replace/*:refs/replace/* refspec in appropriate place in their.git/config) would get replacements transparently, and those who do not fetch those refs would see old commits.
trans-unit.target: 另一种解决方案是使用refs / replace /机制，该机制自1.6.5版起在Git中提供。在此解决方案中，您将替换电子邮件错误的提交；那么任何人谁取指“取代”裁判（类似 fetch = +refs/replace/*:refs/replace/* 在适当位置的Refspec在他们 .git/config ）将得到透明的更换，和那些谁不取这些裁判会看到旧的提交。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively they can try git rebase --pull, which would fast-forward if there weren't any changes in their repository, or rebase their branch on top of re-written commits (we want to avoid merge, as it would keep pre-rewrite comits forever). All of this assuming that they do not have not comitted work; use git stash to stash away changes otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 或者，他们可以尝试 git rebase --pull ，如果存储库中没有任何更改，它将快速转发，或者将其分支基于重写的提交基础（我们希望避免合并，因为它会保持预先-永远重写。所有这些都假设他们还没有工作。使用 git stash 来隐藏更改，否则。

trans-unit.source: And from then on, commands like git shortlog will consider those two names to be the same (unless you specifically tell them not to). See http://schacon.github.com/git/git-shortlog.html for more information.
trans-unit.target: 从那时起，诸如 git shortlog 之类的命令将认为这两个名称是相同的（除非您明确告诉他们不要这样做）。有关更多信息，请参见http://schacon.github.com/git/git-shortlog.html。

trans-unit.target: 另一种方法 Rebasing ：

trans-unit.source: As docgnome mentioned, rewriting history is dangerous and will break other people's repositories.
trans-unit.target: 正如DOCGNOME提到的,改写历史是很危险的,会破坏别人的资料库。

trans-unit.target: 但是，如果您确实想这样做，并且您处于bash环境中（在Linux中，在Windows上没有问题，则可以使用git bash，这是git安装随附的），请使用git filter-branch：

trans-unit.target: 顺便说一句，进行更改后，请使用以下命令从筛选器分支中清除备份：git-backup-clean

trans-unit.source: Changing the author (or committer) would require re-writing all of the history. If you're okay with that and think it's worth it then you should check out git filter-branch. The man page includes several examples to get you started. Also note that you can use environment variables to change the name of the author, committer, dates, etc. -- see the "Environment Variables" section of the git man page.
trans-unit.target: 更改作者（或提交者）将需要重写所有历史记录。如果您对此表示满意，并认为值得这样做，则应查看git filter-branch。手册页包含一些示例，可以帮助您入门。还要注意，您可以使用环境变量来更改作者，提交者，日期等的名称。请参见git手册页的“环境变量”部分。

trans-unit.target: 查看远程分支 "主控"。

trans-unit.source: I was writing a simple script in the school computer, and committing the changes to Git (in a repo that was in my pendrive, cloned from my computer at home). After several commits I realized I was committing stuff as the root user.
trans-unit.target: 我在学校的电脑上写了一个简单的脚本,然后把修改的内容提交到Git上(在我的pendrive里,从家里的电脑上克隆出来的repo里)。经过几次提交后,我发现我是以根用户的身份提交东西。

trans-unit.target: 我在上面的命令中添加了 -p 。对于仅更改最新提交的情况，这不是问题。

trans-unit.source: If other developers didn't based their work on pre-rewrite version, simplest solution would be to re-clone (clone again).
trans-unit.target: 如果其他开发者不是基于pre-rewrite版本,最简单的解决方案就是重新克隆(重新克隆)。

trans-unit.source: If other developers use feature branches, and/or git pull --rebase doesn't work e.g. because upstream is not set up, they have to rebase their work on top of post-rewrite commits. For example just after fetching new changes (git fetch), for a master branch based on / forked from origin/master, one needs to run
trans-unit.target: 如果其他开发人员使用功能分支，和/或 git pull --rebase 因为上游没有设置不起作用例如，他们必须重订其对后重写提交的顶级作品。例如，在获取新更改（ git fetch ）之后，对于基于 origin/master 的 /派生的 master 分支，需要运行

trans-unit.source: If the commits you want to fix are the latest ones, and just a couple of them, you can use a combination of git reset and git stash to go back an commit them again after configuring the right name and email.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要修复的提交是最新的，并且只是其中的几个，则可以在配置正确的名称和电子邮件后使用 git reset 和 git stash 的组合再次返回提交。

trans-unit.source: If you are the only user of this repo or you don't care about possibly breaking the repo for other users, then yes. If you've pushed these commits and they exist where somewhere else can access them, then no, unless you don't care about breaking other people's repos. The problem is by changing these commits you will be generating new SHAs which will cause them to be treated as different commits. When someone else tries to pull in these changed commits, the history is different and kaboom.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是这个版本库的唯一用户,或者你不在乎可能会破坏其他用户的版本库,那么是的。如果你已经推送了这些提交,并且它们存在于其他地方可以访问它们,那就不行,除非你不在乎破坏别人的版本库。问题是通过改变这些提交,你会产生新的 SHA,这将导致它们被视为不同的提交。当别人试图将这些修改后的提交拉入时,历史记录就不一样了。

trans-unit.source: If you are the only user of this repository, you can rewrite history using either git filter-branch (as svick wrote), or git fast-export/git fast-import plus filter script (as described in article referenced in docgnome answer), or interactive rebase. But either of those would change revisions from first changed commit onwards; this means trouble for anybody that based his/her changes on your branch pre-rewrite.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是该存储库的唯一用户，则可以使用 git filter-branch （如svick所写）或 git fast-export / git fast-import 加上过滤器脚本（如docgnome答案中引用的文章所述）来重写历史记录，或交互式变基。但是，其中任何一个都会从第一次更改的提交开始就更改修订；这对于任何将您的更改基于分支预重写的人来说都是麻烦。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Eclipse with EGit, then there is a quite easy solution.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用Eclipse和EGit,那么有一个相当简单的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Note that git stores two different e-mail addresses, one for the committer (the person who committed the change) and another one for the author (the person who wrote the change).

trans-unit.source: Of course, if you committed something as yourself and it should really be someone else, and you don't mind rewriting history at this point, changing the commit author is probably a good idea for attribution purposes (in which case I direct you to my other answer here).
trans-unit.target: 当然,如果你以自己的身份提交的东西确实应该是别人的,而且你不介意在这一点上重写历史,改变提交的作者可能是一个很好的主意,为了归属的目的(在这种情况下,我把你引导到我这里的另一个答案)。

trans-unit.source: One liner, but be careful if you have a multi-user repository - this will change all commits to have the same (new) author and committer.
trans-unit.target: 一个班轮，但是如果您有多用户存储库，请小心-这会将所有提交更改为具有相同（新）的作者和提交者。

trans-unit.source: Push to remote 'master'
trans-unit.target: 推到远程 "主控

trans-unit.source: Quick overview: Checkout your repository to a temp file, checkout all the remote branches, run the script which will rewrite the history, do a force push of the new state, and tell all your colleagues to do a rebase pull to get the changes.
trans-unit.target: 快速概述。将你的版本库结账到一个临时文件,结账到所有的远程分支,运行这个脚本,这个脚本会重写历史,做一个新状态的强制推送,然后告诉所有的同事做一个rebase pull来获取更改。

trans-unit.source: Reference: https://github.com/majdarbash/git-author-change-script
trans-unit.target: 参考：https : //github.com/majdarbash/git-author-change-script

trans-unit.target: 然后，如所描述的过滤器分支的MAN页，删除由备份所有原始裁判 filter-branch （这是破坏性的，先备份）：

trans-unit.source: There was a slight flaw in my original response. If there are any merge commits between the current HEAD and your <some HEAD before all your bad commits>, then git rebase will flatten them (and by the way, if you use GitHub pull requests, there are going to be a ton of merge commits in your history). This can very often lead to very different history (as duplicate changes may be "rebased out"), and in the worst case, it can lead to git rebase asking you to resolve difficult merge conflicts (which were likely already resolved in the merge commits). The solution is to use the -p flag to git rebase, which will preserve the merge structure of your history. The manpage for git rebase warns that using -p and -i can lead to issues, but in the BUGS section it says "Editing commits and rewording their commit messages should work fine."
trans-unit.target: 我的原始回复有轻微缺陷。如果当前 HEAD 和您的 <some HEAD before all your bad commits> 之间有任何合并提交，然后再进行所有错误的提交>，那么 git rebase 将使它们变平（顺便说一句，如果您使用GitHub pull request，将有大量的合并提交您的历史记录）。这通常会导致非常不同的历史记录（因为重复的更改可能会“重新建立”），并且在最坏的情况下，它可能导致 git rebase 要求您解决困难的合并冲突（在合并提交中可能已经解决了） ）。解决方案是使用 -p 标志来 git rebase ，这将保留历史记录的合并结构。的手册页 git rebase 警告说，使用 -p 和 -i 可能会导致问题，但是在 BUGS 部分中，它说“编辑提交并用措辞重新写其提交消息应该可以正常工作。”

trans-unit.source: This has the advantage of all the other solutions here in that you don't have to rewrite history, which can cause problems if you have an upstream, and is always a good way to accidentally lose data.
trans-unit.target: 这样做的好处是,这里的其他方案都有一个好处,那就是不用重写历史记录,如果你有了上游,就会出现问题,一不小心就会丢失数据。

trans-unit.source: This page http://inputvalidation.blogspot.com/2008/08/how-to-change-git-commit-author.html describes how to do it. (I haven't tried this so YMMV)
trans-unit.target: 此页面http://inputvalidation.blogspot.com/2008/08/how-to-change-git-commit-author.html进行了说明。（我还没尝试过，所以YMMV）

trans-unit.source: This solution may be longer to type than some others, but it's highly controllable - I know exactly what commits it hits.
trans-unit.target: 这个方案可能比其他一些方案打字的时间要长,但它的可控性很强--我很清楚地知道它打到的是什么承诺。

trans-unit.source: This will change the author to the name specified, but the committer will be set to your configured user in git config user.name and git config user.email. If you want to set the committer to something you specify, this will set both the author and the committer:
trans-unit.target: 这会将作者更改为指定的名称，但是将在 git config user.name 和 git config user.email 中将提交者设置为您配置的用户。如果要将提交者设置为指定的内容，则将同时设置作者和提交者：

trans-unit.source: This will create a todo-list that looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个像这样的待办事项清单。

trans-unit.source: This will keep all the other commit information (including the dates). The --reuse-message=HEAD option prevents the message editor from launching.
trans-unit.target: 这将保留所有其他提交信息（包括日期）。所述 --reuse-message=HEAD 选项可防止发射该消息编辑器。

trans-unit.source: To change the author and committer, you can do this (with linebreaks in the string which is possible in bash):
trans-unit.target: 要改变作者和提交者,你可以这样做(在字符串中使用行分隔符,这在bash中是可以的)。

trans-unit.source: To speed things up, you can specify a range of revisions you want to rewrite:
trans-unit.target: 为了提高速度,你可以指定你要改写的修改范围。

trans-unit.source: Try this out. It will do the same as above mentioned, but interactively.
trans-unit.target: 试试这个吧。它的作用和上面提到的一样,不过是交互式的。

trans-unit.source: Using Interactive Rebase
trans-unit.target: 使用交互式重基础

trans-unit.source: Using interactive rebase, you can place an amend command after each commit you want to alter. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 使用交互式的rebase,你可以在每一次提交后放置一个修正命令。例如,在每一次提交后都可以放置修正命令。

trans-unit.source: We had trouble with running this on OS X because it somehow messed up line endings in commit messages, so we had to re-run it on a Linux machine afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 我们在OS X上运行这个东西时遇到了麻烦,因为它把提交信息中的行结尾弄乱了,所以我们不得不在Linux机器上重新运行。

trans-unit.source: We have experienced an issue today where a UTF8 character in an author name was causing trouble on the build server, so we had to rewrite the history to correct this. The steps taken were:
trans-unit.target: 今天我们遇到了一个问题,作者名中的UTF8字符在构建服务器上造成了问题,所以我们不得不重写历史记录来纠正这个问题。我们采取的步骤是:

trans-unit.source: We used this in conjunction with cvs2git to migrate our repository from cvs to git.
trans-unit.target: 我们将此与 cvs2git 结合使用，将我们的存储库从cvs迁移到git。

trans-unit.source: When taking over an unmerged commit from another author, there is an easy way to handle this.
trans-unit.target: 当接手另一个作者的未合并提交时,有一个简单的处理方法。

trans-unit.source: While changing the author of your last commit is as simple as git commit --amend --author "Author Name <email@example.com>", there is no one-liner or argument to do the same to the committer information.
trans-unit.target: 虽然更改最后一次提交的作者就像 git commit --amend --author "Author Name <email@example.com>" 一样简单，但是没有任何一种方法可以对提交者信息进行相同的处理。

trans-unit.source: With linebreaks in the string (which is possible in bash):
trans-unit.target: 用字符串中的断线(这在bash中是可以的)。

trans-unit.source: You can also do:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: You can of course automate this procedure... well, all except using git replace which doesn't have (yet) batch mode, so you would have to use shell loop for that, or replace "by hand".
trans-unit.target: 当然，您可以自动执行此过程...好吧，除了使用 git replace 之外（不具有批处理模式），所有操作均如此，因此您必须为此使用shell循环，或“手动”替换。

trans-unit.source: You can then still modify some lines to see where you want to change the author. This gives you a nice middle ground between automation and control: you see the steps that will run, and once you save everything will be applied at once.
trans-unit.target: 然后,你仍然可以修改一些行,看看你想改变作者的地方。这让你在自动化和控制之间有了一个很好的中间地带:你看到的步骤会运行,一旦你保存后,所有的东西都会一次性应用。

trans-unit.source: You can use this as a alias so you can do:
trans-unit.target: 您可以将其用作别名，以便执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: You could do
trans-unit.target: 你可以做的

trans-unit.source: You could skip opening the editor altogether here by appending --no-edit so that the command will be:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过添加 --no-edit 来跳过此处完全打开编辑器的操作 ，这样命令将是：

trans-unit.source: You might get one of these errors:
trans-unit.target: 你可能会得到这样的错误之一。

trans-unit.source: Your problem is really common. See "Using Mailmap to Fix Authors List in Git"
trans-unit.target: 您的问题确实很普遍。请参阅“ 使用Mailmap修复Git中的作者列表 ”

trans-unit.source: and check if replacements take place
trans-unit.target: 并检查是否进行了替换

trans-unit.source: and this will work all automatically, which works when you have hundreds of commits.
trans-unit.target: 而这将自动工作,当你有几百个提交的时候,这将会自动工作。

trans-unit.source: edit or just close the editor that opens, and then do
trans-unit.target: 编辑或只是关闭打开的编辑器,然后做

trans-unit.source: i.e. Sample author-conv-file
trans-unit.target: 即示例 author-conv-file

trans-unit.source: loop the following two commands until you have processed all the commits:
trans-unit.target: 循环以下两条命令,直到你处理完所有的提交。

trans-unit.source: mark all commits that you want to change with edit (or e)
trans-unit.target: 用 edit （或 e ）标记要更改的所有提交

trans-unit.source: or for the last 10 commits:
trans-unit.target: 或为最近10次提交。

trans-unit.source: run git rebase -i <sha1 or ref of starting point>
trans-unit.target: 运行 git rebase -i <sha1 or ref of starting point>

trans-unit.source: save and exit editor (to run).
trans-unit.target: 保存和退出编辑器(运行)。

trans-unit.source: tested with git version 1.7.5.4
trans-unit.target: 使用git版本1.7.5.4进行测试

trans-unit.source: the --no-edit flag makes sure the git commit --amend doesn't ask an extra confirmation
trans-unit.target: 该 --no-edit 标记可以确保 git commit --amend 不要求额外的确认

trans-unit.source: the file you edit will look like this:
trans-unit.target: 你编辑的文件会是这样的。

trans-unit.source: this works in mint-linux-17.3
trans-unit.target: 这在mint-linux-17.3中可以使用

trans-unit.source: to continue the rebase.
trans-unit.target: 以此为基础,继续重做。

trans-unit.source: when you use git rebase -i, you can manually select the commits where to change the author,
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 git rebase -i 时，您可以手动选择更改作者的提交，

trans-unit.source: which presents you with the editable list of commits:
trans-unit.target: 显示了可编辑的提交列表。
